H2: Resizing photos has been made easy with us, start by uploading your file below
TITLE: Resize image- online image resize- safeimagekit
META: Are you looking for a high-quality tool for resizing photos? Well, then you are at the right place. Our online image resize tool is extremely safe, user-friendly, and super quick.

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our image resizer tool resizer the images by retaining its quality.
None of your data is sent on our servers all the operations are done on the browser itself. This enables us to be 100% safe for our users
Our image resizer tool works on almost all kinds of browsers and devices.
Our image resizer tool is very easy to understand no professional is needed to work on our tool.
Our image resizer tool is completely free of cost, you can use all our tools without paying a single penny
Our image resizer tool is completely browser based and no additional software is required to be downloaded on your device.

FAQ.question: Will my file be saved after I complete working on the image resizer tool?
FAQ.answer: No, we do not send any of your files to our servers all the operations are done on the browser itself therefore all your files are completely safe.

FAQ.question: Do I have to do any additional signup or pay extra to use the image resizer tool?
FAQ.answer: Absolutely not, our tool is completely online and does not require you to share any of your personal information with us, like email id, passwords etc. Our tool is completely free of cost.
